title: 1987년 Dunn 사건
summary: 미국 Missouri, MO 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Dunn. 판결일: 1987-06-30. 법원: Missouri Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Michael Lee DUNN v. STATE of Missouri
**판결일**: 1987-06-30
**법원**: Missouri Court of Appeals
**관할**: Missouri, MO

## 변호인

Donald J. Hager, Public Defender, Far-mington, for appellant., William L. Webster, Atty. Gen., Colly Frissell-Durley, Asst. Attys. Gen., Jefferson City, for respondent.

## 인용

- 732 S.W.2d 260

## 판결문 요약


ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Movant appeals from the denial of his second Rule 27.26 motion without an evi-dentiary hearing. The motion challenged his sentence of life imprisonment after having pled guilty to first degree murder.
*261The judgment of the trial court is based on findings of fact and conclusions of law which are not clearly erroneous. The judgment of the trial court is affirmed pursuant to Rule 84.16(b).
...
